com.ephesoft.dcma.util

Class MailUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ephesoft.dcma.util.MailUtil

  • public class MailUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a utility file consisting of various APIs related to different functions that can be performed with an Email.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ephesoft

      • getMailPartAsText

        public static java.lang.String getMailPartAsText(javax.mail.Part part)
                                          throws javax.mail.MessagingException,
                                                 java.io.IOException
        This API handles each message part of a multipart message to extract the mail body. Each part is handled according to its Mime Type.
        Parameters:
        part - Part
        Returns:
        Mail body content of the individual part String
        Throws:
        javax.mail.MessagingException
        java.io.IOException

      • getBodyFromMultipartMessage

        public static java.lang.String getBodyFromMultipartMessage(javax.mail.Message message,
                                           boolean isTextMailBody)
                                                    throws javax.mail.MessagingException,
                                                           java.io.IOException
        This API is used to extract Message body from a Message. If the message is Multipart, each part is treated separately. If the message is Plain Text message, it's body is changed by adding the "pre" HTML tags to maintain the plain text formatting.
        Parameters:
        message - Message
        isTextMailBody -
        Returns:
        Mail body String
        Throws:
        javax.mail.MessagingException
        java.io.IOException

      • getText

        public static java.lang.String getText(javax.mail.Part part)
                                throws javax.mail.MessagingException,
                                       java.io.IOException
        Gets the text content from Part object.
        Parameters:
        part - Part object whose text content is to be retrieved
        Returns:
        returns the text content as a String
        Throws:
        javax.mail.MessagingException
        java.io.IOException

      • readUnseenMailsFromFolder

        public static javax.mail.Message[] readUnseenMailsFromFolder(javax.mail.Folder folder,
                                             java.lang.String serverType)
                                                      throws javax.mail.MessagingException
        This API is used to read Unseen/New mails from a particular mail folder. Mode of reading the mails varies for different mail protocols. POP3 automatically returns NEW mails whereas IMAP needs to be specifically searched against the mails with their SEEN flag as false.
        Parameters:
        folder - Folder
        serverType - String
        Returns:
        Message[] the messages which cleared the search criteria. null in case of exception or when server type is other than IMAP or POP3.
        Throws:
        javax.mail.MessagingException - in case there was an error while reading

      • getFolderFromMailStore

        public static javax.mail.Folder getFolderFromMailStore(javax.mail.Store store,
                                       java.lang.String mailFolderName)
                                                throws javax.mail.MessagingException
        Returns the mail Folder contained in the given Store object whose name is represented by the given mail folder name.
        Parameters:
        store - Store
        mailFolderName - String
        Returns:
        Folder, Returns the folder object if connectivity is successful, and null in any of the following cases
      • the store is null
      • the store is not connected
      • the folder does not exists or cannot be connected.
        • Throws:
        javax.mail.MessagingException
